Title: Increases the number of members on the farm laborers wage board from three to five
Summary: Increases the number of members on the farm laborers wage board from three to five; adds as members the commissioner of agriculture and markets and a member appointed by the Dean of the Cornell University's College of Agriculture and Life Sciences.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to increasing the number of members on the farm laborers wage board from three to five
